name: nativescript-virtual-joystick
description: NativeScript XML plugin to create native Joystick widget (Android only for now).

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-virtual-joystick && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
